name: Domain-Era Anti-Asteroid Satellites
desc: $market is surrounded by an orbital array of hundreds of thousands of domain-era anti-asteroid satellites, each outfitted with enough weaponry to destroy a huge space rock, and scatter it into countless pieces. It's armor and weaponry both seem quite overkill for simple asteroid-clearing; and judging from how eager these satellites seem to be to paint any unknown craft approaching with thousands of targetting lasers, you get the feeling it might have been made for a little more than simple point-defense.
